website_summaries.verdict: The Canon PowerShot SX30 IS is a point-and-shoot camera with a 35x zoom lens. As long as you're not expecting much more than that, it's a very good megazoom.
pros: features for every kind of user
cons: Generally soft, noisy photos at full size

customer_reviews.title: This camera was somewhat of a disappointment. Canon quality traditionally has been very high
customer_reviews.text: This camera was somewhat of a disappointment. Canon quality traditionally has been very high, unfortunately this camera didn’t meet those expectations. The lens was not as sharp as I expected, and it had color fringing. I found that much of my photography was inside where the sensor struggled to keep up the quality, i.e. it had artifacts. With these limits, the effective resolution of the camera was about half the stated resolution. If all I wanted to do is to have 4x6 prints or post pictures on the internet, even half the stated resolution is far more pixels than needed for these purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Critical thought

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! Not only for the quality, but the flip screen is a very big life saver. I will start using this camera to film my youtube videos and outdoor scenes. The pictures are beautiful and everything that was in the description, came with the camera. I love it and the price is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Miracle Milli

customer_reviews.title: This camera is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe I got this camera at the incredible price I did. It’s used but looks brand new. Not a scratch on it. I’m 28, and not a photographer, but wanted to take on some projects. This is my first camera (aside from small digital ones before smart phones were a thing) and it is absolutely perfect and incredible and I’m super excited to create and learn. I forgot what a real picture not taken with a cell phone is supposed to look like. I highly recommend investing in this one.
customer_reviews.author: NovaBee

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is so intuitive you only need to read the manual to know a few of the buttons! Macro shots of flowers, which I use frequently, gives true color and great shots! I have not had the opportunity to try the 35x telephoto, but will be able to report after my trip back to South Africa this October. My Canon I used last year also took great photos. I don't expect this camera to be any different. Great camera for the money. I would recommend it to anyone wanting a great all round camera. I have not used the movie mode, so cannot comment on that either.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy H. Geraci

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok.... 720 so not the highest quality but it is as advertised. Looks ok and sound is very very good on this camera. With a little extra lighting, this camera could work wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: A classmate of my wife was submitting fantastic pictures to Facebook so I asked her which camera she had...this one. I couldn't be happier. I started taking 35 MM photos 40+ years with a Konica Autoreflex TC that I absolutely loved because you take pictures in automatic or manual modes. This Canon is the first digital camera, reasonably priced, that you can do the same. I love this camera...
customer_reviews.author: Bill Pupkis

customer_reviews.title: Canon
customer_reviews.text: Very well finished product. Images are not as sharp as I would have expected from an expensive Canon camera. I had hoped that the picture quality would rival those that I take with my Canon SLR with Canon zoom lens. The autofocus is quick, but the focus is not sharp. The Zoom function sometimes seems to "lock up" which is quite surprising. Overall a little disappointing, I expected better performance based on my experience with my small Canon S450 "point and shoot". Given the little difference in size I think I'm better off using my Canon Rebel with zoom!
customer_reviews.author: SportsDoc

customer_reviews.title: Best camera I ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful camera. Had the same model but it broke, so was pleased to be able to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: irishcats

customer_reviews.title: Good for me
customer_reviews.text: This camera replaced one identical to it. I broke my first sx30. I primarily I used this camera for nature photos and wildlife. Although I have not put this camera through some steady work, so far it is performing as well as my first one. If I discover any faults later on, I will add to this report.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Fus

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Handy Camera.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this camera for a few years and it is a great camera. I have a full size Canon 5D mark II but this one is the one i often grab when headed out the door knowing I wanted more than my cell phone photos and did not want to lug all my pro equipment. It is light, durable, takes wonderful high quality photos and videos.
customer_reviews.author: S. OD

customer_reviews.title: Amazing telephoto lens
customer_reviews.text: Amazing telephoto lens. I had one that got damaged (fell out of the back seat of a car onto the ground as I was loading painting. I was devastated, but ordered a replacement immediately when I discovered I couldn't fix the old one. I use it all the time. My replacement - which is exactly the same - seems a little slower. You can't do rapid succession of shots in a row.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Murray

customer_reviews.title: my first camera
customer_reviews.text: i shopped\researched meticulously prior to this purchase. I am an mom of three who needed to get some pictures before my babies are all grown. This camera does way more than i bargained for. The pictures are crisp and clear and the videos are also fabulous. the most interesting though is the battery life. I charged mine fully once. It is still going strong after, 4 concerts, 6 diners, endless church functions and the whole christmas season. Lets just say I have no regrets with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ttdiva

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this camera since January of this year and I absolutely love it. Takes fabulous pictures even if you don't know how to use a camera other than pushing the shutter button! Only thing I think is funny is I bought the camera for $369 through Amazon, not a daily deal but still $90 cheaper than it is today. Oh how prices change around the holidays! If you are looking into purchasing this camera, maybe wait a few months to see if the price drops? Just some advice :)
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: The quality is good but not much than any point and shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: Shoots decent quality pictures. Zoom is extremely powerful. However if you are looking for high quality shots this might not be the camera for you. The quality is good but not much than any point and shoot camera. And minimally better than a good cell phone. For truly high Def photos spend a little more.. you'll get better quality photos
customer_reviews.author: joe ballangee

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Now that I had it for a few years, it still works as new. Features are great.
customer_reviews.author: Product User

customer_reviews.title: Overall a nice camera
customer_reviews.text: The optical zoom is great on this camera. I think the design could have been better as far as the photo preview. I find I am inadvertently pushing the button while trying to take photos. This is my third canon camera and I find they are all a good quality. I would recommend it. I enjoy taking nature photos and the zoom really makes it easy to get close-ups of birds and animals that would otherwise be out of range. You will see good quality up to about 70 times zoom on it. After that, it gets a bit grainy.
customer_reviews.author: cheroberta

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Unless you're into very serious photography, which I am not, and you need lots of expensive, interchangeable lenses, which I don't, there is nothing not to love about this camera. It takes pictures that I have to dumb down anyway if I want to send them in email, and that are awesome. The lens wonderful, the magnification, wide angle, image stabilization, and all the rest exceed anything I need. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: BobbyB

customer_reviews.title: canon with vision
customer_reviews.text: decided to buy a new unit for the summer and this one caught my eye. I had purchased another canon with a 20x zoom and then was forced to return it for one reason or another. when I saw this camera, I decided to get it to replace the other and it is a good decision. good canon quality and light carry, two ways to compose the shots and bright screens.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn E. Polk

customer_reviews.title: Bought it as a gift--Husband loved it!
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely high quality camera for the price. I'm no techiie, just a wife who bought a gift, but my husband loves it and he's taking the most amazing pictures. He posted this absolutely beautiful picture of a mountain view that looked like it came out of a magazine. Then I realized it was the view from my back yard! Can't rave enough about this camera.
customer_reviews.author: BonnieD

customer_reviews.title: Love my canon,
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this camera, was kayaking this summer and our kayak flipped and the camera went under for about 5seconds while filming the incident of being thrown out of the canoe in the rapids and the camera dried out and was never sent in for repairs and stills works perfectly! And still takes greats pictures, love this camera
customer_reviews.author: susie

customer_reviews.title: Superb !
customer_reviews.text: I love this Camera and also got good deal from Amazon. This has amazing picture quality and ZOOM In feature. The only concern is, while I am zooming becuase it has big lense with extra zoom features, it make little noise (like shutter) when it stops and also lost vision for a while. Other than that this is the best product so far I have observed as I spend lot of time to find similar Camera in this category and finally concluded that this is what I really looking for. Nice & crispy Picture Quality (In Door and Out Door). Love This. !
customer_reviews.author: Sunil Vyas

customer_reviews.title: Great zoom
customer_reviews.text: Excellent zoom in this model... model may have even out of market now but was a good buy at that time
customer_reviews.author: jai

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a Christmas gift for my teenage grand daughter. She is thrilled with it and takes it everywhere she goes. It didn't come with an instruction booklet, but luckily I have the exact same camera so I photocopied a copy for her. The camera wa shipped quickly and packed well.. Thanks so much to the seller!!
customer_reviews.author: Rae J. Helms

customer_reviews.title: The zoom should be great for that
customer_reviews.text: Still feeling out the still camera but I am liking what I have found so far. Only issue I can see is that it is a little slow in low lighting, other than that it seems to do very well. This winter I will see how it will work when I shoot some indoor hockey. The zoom should be great for that, I just hope the exposure can keep up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the money this camera gets fantastic shots. It is a little slow for nature ...
customer_reviews.text: For the money this camera gets fantastic shots. It is a little slow for nature shots but does great even at full extension. It zooms optically out to 35X but does good stabilized shots out to 142X. I have carried it in a back pack for three or four years and it is a work horse and takes punishment like a pro. The hand held picture I posted with this post was taken at 25 yards from my deer stand and not touched up in photo shop.
customer_reviews.author: Donald L. Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Everything fine, useful as expected & good delivery service
customer_reviews.text: Everything fine, useful as expected & good delivery service... First one came with a little failure, then I returned it and get a new one with no issue until today...
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Michelena

customer_reviews.title: Canon sx30 IS
customer_reviews.text: It does not come with a usb cable nor memory card. Also, when I opened the package the camera and bag it came in was a little dusty.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for amateurs!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for people with amateur skills who want professional quality pictures. I purchased this camera to take with me on a vacation to Bali and came back with terrific pictures and videos that everyone is complimenting. I'm very happy with the purchase. The only thing I would change about the design is the view finder. It can be a bit cumbersome for some shots as the screen opens up. I would prefer it to be embedded in the camera. That said, the swivel function is good and helps you position the camera to get the best shot.
customer_reviews.author: kerrym

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. I no longer need my DSLR for most pictures. I even got some excellent bird and mammal pictures with this little beauty. The 11" X 14" prints I had made are as good as the prints from the DSLR. It is simply amazing. To see a bunch of my pictures, look at this gallery: [...]
customer_reviews.author: H. Potter

customer_reviews.title: I haven't tried all of the features yet, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried all of the features yet, but I was quite impressed with the features I have used. The low light setting was able to capture pictures beyond what I expected based on the aperture range. Also, the video was quite clear. You can zoom during the video. My only complaint is that you cannot hear sound using the playback function. It does record the sound, you just can't hear it until you play it over your laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures and videos!!
customer_reviews.text: so I bought this camera because I my other canon camera broke! I wanted something with a viewfinder because I make YouTube videos and it works great!!! Even the pictures come out great I take pictures of my makeup looks and it catches all the colors and comes out very clear. I honestly love it so far
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT COME WITH A CHARGER OR CHORD
customer_reviews.text: its a decent camera for the price however, really sketchy why it didn't come with the battery charger but came with the battery. please put that on the title before hand because I was unaware of that
customer_reviews.author: unavailable

customer_reviews.title: Does it all
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy camera to use with all the bells and whistles. Great telephoto lens without the hassle of a big long lens. We can take pictures 1/2 mile away as if the subjects were right in front of us. Clear shots. Lots of options for the creative photographer as well as presets for the beginner.
customer_reviews.author: ByChance

customer_reviews.title: What I have Been Waiting For!
customer_reviews.text: Just love this Canon sx30 for enabling me to get close to the bird and animal life that I live around. I finally discovered the fishing habits of the kingfisher. That some wild ducks eat fish. That dew drops on flowers shine in the mornings sunrise. AND, the concerns about picture quality seem to be refuted by the online photo postings as they are breathtaking. Love the lithium battery rather than constantly feeding it store bought batteries as I did with my sx10is. Bravo Canon. I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dyess

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera to replace an old one, was a great decision. It's easy to use, if you take the time to go throught the menu and take your time with the first pictures you take. After that it's just great memories made easy. I would reccomend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a gift for my wife. We charged the battery and were sitting on our deck just 3 hours after she opened her gift. All of a sudden a deer ran down our neighbors yard. It stopped about 80 - 100 yards away like it wanted to have its photo taken. My wife took several photos and when we went inside we noticed the deer was in fact a fawn. What a zoom and great quality camera.
customer_reviews.author: jokebroker

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly--and in very good shape in regards to exterior wear
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera used. Works perfectly--and in very good shape in regards to exterior wear. Good value for the money and great seller.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J. Mcdonnell

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding !!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter who needed a new camera. She didn't want anything bulky or difficult to use. This camera fit the bill to a T.. Light weight: she can handle her twin sons and shoot one handed.... and it's super easy.. Great pictures are forthcoming !
customer_reviews.author: Christine M. Rutkowski

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Works like a champ. Seller sent me an extra battery charger, but it is for a different battery, so it's useless. Not a problem, though, as I only need to charge one battery at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: More bang for the buck!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I bought this camera for our daughter's field trip. We were so happy with the results we got... the wide angle lens was great for taking group shots, ensuring everybody is "in" the picture as well as landscape shots while telephoto is also okay for taking portraits. Though not in the SLR speed range, this camera is great for travel and very practical. Overall, we think this is a very good camera for the family. We bought ours just recently, so we are still trying to master all its useful functions....for its price and Canon expertise...this is really a lot of bang for the buck!!!!
customer_reviews.author: lloyd rocks

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a Koday which claimed 26X and had returned it. The pictures were not as good as with the Canon SX10is I have been using. Purchasing the SX30is was a leap of faith as I really didn't believe the claims that I had read. But it was well worth the investment. It is faster when using the flash and I can take photos of distant objects or scenery that was impossible before. Also you can purchase extra batteries at a more than reasonable price. I strongly recommend this camera for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: David Ryan

customer_reviews.title: The best buy!!
customer_reviews.text: So so happy with this purchase! I love my camera, I take it everywhere, friends are amazed with the quality of my pictures. I am not a professional photographer, I am still learning some things this camera can do but so far I am thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: MKaye

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best camera I've owned and getting away from SLR has been wonderful. The camera takes great still's I can get shots of the craters on the moon and honey bee's in flight. The HD movies are fantastic 15min with a 2gig card and although the users manual is lengthy with a couple of filters just go out and play with it. 1000+ shots on a 2gig card, I'ld suggest an extra battery. but 300 shots is easy out of one.

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera with great digital zoom
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to replace my 1st one...the zoom is phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Lots of BANG for your BUCK!!!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot or soul searching before buying this camera. I considered going back to the full size EOS but, I found I didn't use a camera as much as I used too and I did not want to haul a lot of weight around when I wanted to use it. This camera has a lot of features both for beginner and someone who has used cameras before. I guarentee if you get it you will like it. It's light, not bulky, easy to use and has a lot of features.
customer_reviews.author: Steve F.

customer_reviews.title: Extraordinary product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the SX30 IS for almost 2 years. For me it has been a nice experience taking shots with this camera. I can see the difference with a previous canon I had (A620). The White balances is better and the definition improves as well. The Auto mode take great pictures even on dark places. It's only to know a little more on aperture and shutter speed settings to take more special ones. I have no complain so far, battery last more than average, flash is powerful. It is an extraordinary product
customer_reviews.author: juan

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: My son heard me say that I was looking for an economically priced zoom camera that I could use for birding & wildlife photography. He found this one on Amazon & with his knowledge of cameras, highly recommended it. So far I am really pleased with it's performance & am eager to visit Pea Island WR in the Outer Banks of NC to get some good shots of waterfowl. I am extremely pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Martha G. Howell

customer_reviews.title: New Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love the camera so far, still learning how to use all the features.It's different from all the Kodak cameras that I used, but I'm sure I will learn as time goes by. My brother who takes excellent pictures recommended this one...
customer_reviews.author: kathyd2011

customer_reviews.title: Just too good for the price.. (I bought it when it was $369)
customer_reviews.text: What else do u need? 35x Optical Zoom with full manual controls, Aperture Priority and Shutter priority and what not... This camera can perform even better than many of the known DSLRs if a person knows proper photography... A really good investment... The VDO capabilities might not be that good... but the rest of the features and quality super-cedes that... A must buy for people looking to shoot professional photographs without investing in an SLR..
customer_reviews.author: Padmanabhan

customer_reviews.title: Canon SX30IS Performs Well
customer_reviews.text: Canon has done it again, perfected a great, lightweight camera that is user friendly for an amateur yet provides a depth of options for a serious photographer. The shutter button is a bit cumbersome and its placement takes some getting used to, but the digital images that are produced by this terrific camera is worth the effort of balancing the camera in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: DJP

customer_reviews.title: JC
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera!! It takes great pictures and wonderful videos. It not only makes great pictures and videos, but it is easy to use. I would certainly recommend this camera to anyone looking for a really good camera.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: An excellent camera. You don't have to be a professional ...
customer_reviews.text: An excellent camera. You don't have to be a professional to get top quality pictures but camera has plenty of options for you to get creative if you are. Lots of fun here.
customer_reviews.author: Margie plaven

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not the sharpest lens, but acceptable for the price. The incredible zoom comes in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Compassionator

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Camera!! This camera is for your everyday and semi pro life. Its has a lot of the bells and whistle of a DSLR but its not one. Its more of a cross between the DSLR and digital camera.
customer_reviews.author: tkt561

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: The optical zoom and lens quality makes it possible to photo animals at 100 yards. I tested this camera against others in this price range and the Canon SX30IS took clearer, crisper pictures of objects at 100 yards.
customer_reviews.author: John Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera last week and just got it today and I LOVE it. It takes great pictures and the zoom is Amazing. It's the best camera I have ever owned my last one was an olympus I don't know the model but it was nothing compared to THIS. It is slow when doing continuous shooting but that doesn't matter to me as long as I can get good pictures which I can. Love this Camera and would definately Recommend this to a friend. Great camera no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Felly26

customer_reviews.title: One of the best camera's for beginners
customer_reviews.text: One of the best camera's for beginners. Amazing zooming + Picture quality. I like color filtering , effects and Manual mode. Can capture moon like a telescope.
customer_reviews.author: Beautyc

customer_reviews.title: Canon at it's finest
customer_reviews.text: I know that this is not the latest release from Canon but I could argue that this camera is, at some circunstances, better than the new ones, in fact, if you use the common websites to compare camera quality, the SX30IS is only losing in comparison for, let's say, the SX40 because of it being a higher price and bigger body. The lens, the sensor, the wide angle and speed are better in the SX30IS in my humble oppinion.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Bueno Barbosa

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful camera
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this camera! I love to take pictures and have a good eye but I hate having to fiddle too much with a camera. This one is easy and takes awesome pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda M.

customer_reviews.title: Good point and shoot camera.
customer_reviews.text: Still using it several years later as my backup camera. Easy to use and takes great pics. 35x zoon is great. It was ahead of it's time when I bought it in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: JD Skipworth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. I didn't want a full SLR, but wanted something better than a point and shoot. This camera fills the gap letting you dabble with photography in a cost effective way. Takes great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: RJG1999

customer_reviews.title: review
customer_reviews.text: awesome,,,this product performed as expected and the star rating reflects that
customer_reviews.author: Steven Wells

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty decent
customer_reviews.text: I like this camera. The best part was the zoom which goes pretty far. That is the main reason I bought it because popular tourist places get crowded and i'm often all the way at the back. The downside is this camera does not have good quality photos for low light. Also, the auto focus and shutter speed is very slow. Many photos get out of focus so I have always have to take more than one photo before I get a good quality one. Other than that, for the price and for being a point and shoot camera, this is a pretty decent camera that can be used for a long time before an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera and have had for awhile now. Weve used it many times and takes wonderful pictures. I would have another!
customer_reviews.author: FastEarle

customer_reviews.title: Read my comment
customer_reviews.text: Takes great pictures and video. Unfortunately the smart phones are catching up to this quality so I would think twice about getting this.
customer_reviews.author: wildman

customer_reviews.title: Still picture is amazing; video quality was horrible
customer_reviews.text: Still picture is amazing ; video quality was horrible! The claim of full HD video is misleading or defective camera...
customer_reviews.author: RTS

customer_reviews.title: Camera is fine but is bulky
customer_reviews.text: Camera does the job but is quite bulky to handle
customer_reviews.author: james f.

customer_reviews.title: Great 'All-In-One' Package
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for sons' graduation gift and are both VERY pleased. Is true what others say about 'low light' pictures being outstanding along with all other credited attributes. True, the view screen is a 'bit' grainy, but who cares over such a minor problem when EVERYTHING else is spectacular for the value? When reviewing pics, they are crystal clear, just like they turn out:) Movies and sound included! All other reviews I've read on extended zoom camera packages have at least one or two major problems concerning: either/or movies, sound, pictures, flash, hand-ability, and ease of use. Yeah, Canon!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mintz

customer_reviews.title: It's a Canon Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: This little gem has been through hell and back with me. It's very rugged, and seldom is safely stored in a camera bag. I've taken her out too many of the cemeteries that I photograph and document. The only thing I hate about this camera, is that all the function button are on the right side of the body. There is a thumb grip on the right side of the body as well, however, you'll find that your thumb is always falling off the tiny little thumb rest, and thus activating one or more of the special function buttons. Very poor manufacturer design, placing all the buttons on the right hand side.
customer_reviews.author: review4u

customer_reviews.title: Smile
customer_reviews.text: Canon has always been my choice for cameras. This is another great Canon camera. Pics and video are great. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Aggie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great starter camera, I am really learning a lot about taking pictures. It takes fantastic pictures and is tops in quality. Everything was delivered well in time for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Justified38

customer_reviews.title: but I loved it so much I bought another for myself to ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave my 1st one to my son when I upgraded cameras, but I loved it so much I bought another for myself to be a backup camera. By the way, the zoom is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Martha Winslow-Cole

customer_reviews.title: the best in cameras canon
customer_reviews.text: good product woks very well and it have a good quality, good materials and good price i recommend it always
customer_reviews.author: gusafro

customer_reviews.title: Quinn
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a camera of this quality before!! I think this thing is awesome!!! I wish it had a better manual with it though. The Canon has an easy start up guide with it. It is very easy to set up. In the guide it says that Eye-Fi Sd cards might not work. My Eye-Fi card is working just fine and transfers all my pictures to my computer. The camera is easy to hold and press the shutter button at the same time. I love this camera!!
customer_reviews.author: quinn

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Had purchased this to be gifted so tested it for a small time and everything works and is good for a camera between point and shoot and DSLR features
customer_reviews.author: J V

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is everything a beginning photographer could want. It zooms in as far as it would with other cameras with an extra lens. It has multiple settings, the screen flips around for excellent camera-whoring duck-face moments, and is neither too small or too big, so I don't feel like a dorky dad taking pictures of his kids in Disneyland.
customer_reviews.author: Sswain918

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this camera! It is by far the best camera I have ever owned. It is so easy to use, and takes awesome pictures! The pictures are so clear and they look like a professional took them instead of an amateur like me!

customer_reviews.title: My first camera.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as my first "pro" and I enoyed it, I had a lot of fun, I traveled with it, never fail, even when received beach sand, salty water, rain, wind, bumps, etc. And is still working. The zoom is amazing.

customer_reviews.title: My SX10IS was better.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed - this camera is not up to the standard set by the SX10IS. The pictures too grainy at long telephoto (500-840mm) and shutter works slow on normal (HH) people shots. There is a noticeable delay from when you shoot to when it snaps pic. Oh well. i'll do better research on a replacement.

customer_reviews.title: I love the Canon SX30IS!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! It is so easy to use and I am just getting into photography so it is perfect. There aren't too many features or difficult screens to navigate. The only issue I had was figuring out how to get the Flash hot shoe off. With an easy online video from YouTube though I found it! Recommended by avid Canon users!

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price point
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a camera that would provide me with some DLR features, without the DLR price and hassle, and this camera does that. The zoom and low light photo quality is amazing. I don't think the photo quality is such that you could blow up a photo to much beyond a 8 by 10, but for hobby photography, it's a great camera.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera

Great zoom lens and easy to use. I've taken lots of pictures already and enjoy the ease of using it. Amazon always ships quickly and never a problem to exchange items when not what I wanted.

customer_reviews.title: best camera in its class!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! This is my third in the Canon S IS series...I had the S3 IS, then the S5 IS and now this. AWESOME. Love the video quality and all the features (tilt shift, selective color, fisheye, etc.) And the ZOOM. }et me tell ya, this thing has ZOOM. I recently took this to Disneyland as my backup/video and I was not disappointed!

customer_reviews.title: Canon Powershot sx30 IS
customer_reviews.text: Canon PowerShot SX30 IS isthe best PowerShot of the series so far. I had a S3 IS before, and even smaller onces in the past, all with zoom and image stabilizers, which I really liked. But the sx30 IS is really a step up with the double of pixels and an even greater zoom (35x instead of 12x). A fine piece of equipment!

My favorite feature however is the flip out lcd screen. My husband and I take trips alone and this lets me take pics of us together and center with the background. I can also take pics of myself. Love it!!!

I thought this would be a good camera for me to experiment with and "if" I should get better would like to graduate to a more advanced camera. I'm having lots of fun with it!! It's pretty too.

product_meta.title: Canon SX30IS 14.1MP Digital Camera with 35x Wide Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom and 2.7 Inch Wide LCD (OLD MODEL)
product_meta.description:
Canon's 4344B001 PowerShot SX30 IS 14.1MP Compact Digital Camera has got you prepared for your next extreme photo opportunity. This point-and-shoot digital camera comes with a massive 35x wide-angle (24-840mm) optical zoom lens - a first for any PowerShot. It also comes with a 2.7-inch Vari-angle LCD, 14.1 megapixels, Zoom Framing Assist and much more. Shoot superb 720p HD video with stereo sound and then view them with an HDMI output connector for easy playback on your HDTV.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


The PowerShot SX30 IS has got you prepared for your next extreme photo opportunity. This point-and-shoot digital camera comes with a massive 35x Wide-Angle (24-840mm) Optical Zoom lens--a first for any PowerShot! It also comes with a 2.7-inch Vari-angle LCD, 14.1 Megapixels, High Dynamic Range, Zoom Framing Assist and much more. 




Canon PowerShot SX30 Highlights 

35x wide-angle optical zoom (24-840mm) with Optical Image Stabilizer
The PowerShot SX30 IS is equipped with a 35x Optical Zoom lens with a focal length of 4.3-150.5mm (35mm equivalent: 24-840mm) that allows you to shoot any scene from wide-angle to telephoto. The camera uses a VCM (Voice Coil Motor) for high-speed, quiet, energy-efficient lens movement with precise control. Focal length is conveniently indicated on the lens barrel. 

The lens is optimized to fully exploit its zoom length and wide shooting angle in concert with the camera's high 14.1 Megapixel resolution. UD glass effectively suppresses chromatic aberration, while enhanced negative refractive power ensures that distortion at the wide-angle is also corrected. Further aberration is controlled with the inclusion of a double-sided aspherical glass-molded lens and ultra-high refraction index lens. 

The SX30 IS is equipped with Canon's acclaimed Optical Image Stabilizer Technology that automatically detects and corrects camera shake--one of the leading causes of fuzzy or blurred shots. Even when zoomed in, you can get the steady, crisp, brilliant images you'll be proud to shoot and share. And Canon's Optical Image Stabilizer Technology is convenient to use. It functions perfectly with or without a flash. 

Improvements to Movie modes: Dynamic mode enables users to use the Optical Image Stabilizer while shooting video
Dynamic IS allows you to capture video with more precision and ease than ever before! Without having to make any additional camera adjustments, Dynamic IS automatically operates the moment you start recording video. This image stabilizer continuously readjusts throughout the camera's entire zoom range to correct a broad range of motion -- especially when shooting in the wide-angle end, so footage comes out steady and clear even while you're walking and recording at the same time! 


And with a powerful 35x Optical Zoom, you'll never be too far away from capturing your greatest memories! Best of all, the Optical Zoom can now be used while shooting video--a first for any of the Canon PowerShot SX digital cameras! So no matter the distance or environment, Canon lets you stay confident that you'll capture the footage you want. 

Shoots superb 720p HD video with stereo sound; HDMI output
The PowerShot SX30 IS lets you record video in beautiful high definition (1280 x 720 pixels). The camera also makes it easy to enjoy HD videos (and still photos) on your HDTV with a mini-HDMI connector for direct connection to a high-definition TV monitor. You'll enjoy the HD experience with no degradation of image or audio in the signal, plus the ability to display up to 130 still images at once. 





New Zoom Framing Assist button
With its 35x Optical Zoom lens, the SX30 IS can certainly capture subjects located at a very far distance; however, even with a powerful zoom lens it can often be tricky to track a moving subject while zoomed out to the maximum telephoto range and attempting to steady the camera. To counter this problem, Canon created the Zoom Framing Assist function. By simply pressing and holding the convenient Zoom Framing Assist function button, the camera will automatically zoom out to a wider focal point, allowing you to look for your elusive subject. Once found, releasing the button will cause the camera to return to its original position and intelligently keep the subject in focus, so you don't have to trouble yourself with any of the controls. Recording video and images has never been easier with a Canon PowerShot! 




Advanced Smart AUTO intelligently selects the proper settings
Just set the Canon PowerShot SX30 IS to Smart AUTO and you're ready for maximum enjoyment from your picture taking every time. It's a relaxing and satisfying way to shoot because you can completely concentrate on your subject knowing that the camera has the technical details covered. Advanced Canon technology intelligently analyzes your situation and shooting conditions. Then it automatically selects an appropriate setting from 28 specially defined settings. So whether you're photographing flowers, a captivating sunset, or your friends at the park, you can be confident that you're getting dramatic, memorable images. 

DIGIC 4 Image Processor and 14.1 megapixels
The PowerShot SX30 IS is equipped with many of the same features as a higher-end camera: an ultra-powerful zoom, eye-popping resolution and advanced picture-improving technology. 14.1 Megapixels of resolution gives your photography incomparable depth and ensures that any section of any shot can be enlarged and cropped with no loss in quality when you edit the image or even if you choose to print the image. It can create crisp, clear 13" x 19" posters. 

Canon's proprietary DIGIC Image Processors have long set its cameras apart from the competition, and the new DIGIC 4 sets the bar even higher. Faster, more accurate noise reduction delivers better image quality, even at high ISO speeds. 

iSAPS Technology is an entirely original scene-recognition technology developed for digital cameras by Canon. Using an internal database of thousands of different photos, iSAPS works with the advanced DIGIC 4 Image Processor to improve focus speed and accuracy, as well as exposure and white balance. 

Large 2.7-inch Vari-angle LCD enables easy viewing
The camera's 2.7-inch PureColor System LCD screen gives you the big picture, whether you're shooting, reviewing or showing off your images. This high-resolution screen offers a crisp, clear picture to make shooting, playback and using the camera's menu functions especially convenient. The clear and bright LCD also features Night Display for easy viewing in low light. It also has an electronic viewfinder that provides sharp images when you shoot up close during Macro photography. 

Lithium-ion rechargeable batteries, which makes powering up simple
The PowerShot SX30 IS now uses a rechargeable lithium-ion NB-7L battery. For ultimate convenience and simplicity, just charge the batteries and you're ready for your next photographic adventure! 

What's in the Box

 * PowerShot SX30 IS Camera body 
 * Lithium-ion Battery Pack NB-7L 
 * Battery Charger CB-2LZ 
 * Neck Strap NS-DC11 
 * Lens Cap 
 * Case for Hot Shoe Cap 
 * AV Cable AVC-DC400ST 
 * USB Interface Cable IFC-400PCU 
 * Digital Camera Solution CD-ROM
feature_bullets: 35x wide-angle optical zoom (24-840mm) with Optical Image Stabilizer
Improvements to Movie modes: use the Optical Image Stabilizer in the wide-angle setting;Optical Zoom is now available while shooting video
720p HD video with stereo sound; HDMI output
New Zoom Framing Assist button; DIGIC 4 Image Processor and 14.1 megapixels
Capture images and video to SD/SDHC/SDXC memory card, MultiMediaCard, MMC Plus Card, HC MMC Plus Card (not included)
